headline: Worst Spate of Downgrades Since 2021 Signals Pain
summary: (Bloomberg) -- Credit rating downgrades are becoming more frequent, the latest sign that companies are starting to perform worse and raising fresh questions about whether corporate debt valuations should be as high as they are.
